## QUERY
项目的 Markdown 解析器支持哪些语法？任务列表 checkbox 语法是如何处理的？


## RESULT
```json
{
  "markdownParser": "markdown-it (v14.1.0) with custom Vue component rules",
  "supportedSyntax": [
    "【词条】 - Wiki term reference (custom, renders as wiki-term component)",
    "【词条】：定义 - Inline definition within current file (custom, renders as wiki-definition component)",
    "%% [计算值] <设计值> %% - Planning formula with calculated/design values (custom, renders as wiki-formula component)",
    "```mermaid ... ``` - Mermaid diagram (custom, renders as mermaid-diagram component)",
    "Standard Markdown: headings (#), bold (**), italic (*), lists, code blocks, tables, links, blockquotes, horizontal rules"
  ],
  "taskListSupport": "NOT SUPPORTED - Checkbox syntax (- [ ] / - [x]) is not implemented. Standard markdown-it is configured without task list plugin. Checkboxes would render as plain list items with literal [ ] text, not interactive elements. No handling in either TypeScript (server/indexer/parser.ts) or Go (server-go/indexer/parser.go) parsers."
}
```
